contentrichtext.text: '''Kingdom Identity Ministries''' (KIM) is a [[Christian Identity]] outreach ministry based in [[Harrison, Arkansas]],Hilliard, Robert L.; Michael C. Keith ''Waves of Rancor'' M. E. Sharpe 1999 ISBN 978-0-7656-0131-5 p.158 [http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=y5In7xScVbwC&pg=PA158&dq= "kingdom+identity+ministries"]</ref><ref>Ham, Ken; A. Charles Ware, Todd A. Hillard ''Darwin's Plantation'' New Leaf Publishing Group 2007 ISBN 978-0-89051-497-9 p.53 [http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=gTVdmGfjscwC&pg=PA53&dq= "kingdom+identity+ministries"]</ref> It functions primarily as a distributor of Identity-oriented books, tracts and audiotapes. Its catalog includes works by [[Wesley Swift]], William Cameron, [[Bertrand Comparet]], [[Howard Rand]] and [[Dewey H "Buddy" Tucker|Dewey "Buddy" Tucker]]. KIM also offers correspondence courses through its "American Institute of Theology" and it produces a radio program, "Herald of Truth", which is broadcast on [[shortwave]], [[Satellite radio|satellite]] and [[Internet radio]]. ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == * {{official website|http://www.kingidentity.com/}} [[Category:Christian Identity]] [[Category:Neo-Nazi organizations in the United States]] [[Category:White supremacist groups in the United States]] {{Christian-org-stub}}
